post.body: Thanks Ken. Looks like I may be on FOUR times this week or over the next two weeks. Maybe I should learn to do my own hair!
LOL. Good call. If you haven't already, ck to see if you have a Personal Family Lawyer in your neighborhood. I've trained them.
re gifts, I've gotten so much food, I've gained 10#s before its even xmas! I'd go with a book or better yet a GC to Amazon
Found you re @kenmcarthur ... we meet at System Seminar. Looks like you are doing great. Great to "see" you again.
Hi Ken! Good to tweet you. :) I've noticed that 2,000 followers is some sort of tipping point. #s increase rapidly. YAY!
Why meeting with a probate lawyer? Would be better to meet with a lawyer who will help you avoid probate. :)
Woohoo!
I know Mindy a couple of ways - natural birth community in South Bay, biz comm'y in S. Bay, and thru Andrea Young. How is she?
Oh, get the M3, yes. I so miss my BMW, but it just wasn't practical once I became a single mom and the ex took the minivan.
I'd go with Echkart Tolle, a New Earth first and then Byron Katie, Loving What Is, follow up with Wattles, Science of Getting Rich
Um, it's not only teenage guys who can't live up. I don't think any guy could live up to Edward.
They are all so great. Would depend on where you are at right now. What is your biggest challenge right now?
My goals: Immed. - finish Twilight; 2009 - 100 Personal Family Lawyers , Book #2, & Coaching Moms to Millions; LT - TV Show
I'm high as a kite, I just might, stop to check you out ...
This cool set: http://is.gd/dkkZ Which for some reason is listed for $145.95 on Amazon, but I got it for $30 @ Target. Woohoo!
Send others you come across! I'll write my own post about it when @davedee leaves for xmas.
they made me FEEL, not think. The author of that article's too much up in her head about the whole thing. Have you read them??
Thanks for the link. Spoiler alert for any of you that check it out. The article's too much of an analysis. I loved the books bcuz
Holy moly, 9 times! Yes, I have the 5th man. on my computer now and I'm taking sips from it. Don't want to read it too quickly.
Oh yeah, absolutely. Just watched the trailer. Hm, maybe I will go see it. OMG, this obsession must stop!
LOL. I would recommend you go out and get all 4 of them immediately and plan not to leave your house for a week.
Oh yes, read them, read them. You'll love it. It will be a good bonding experience for both of you. :)
If she's already read the first 2, I think the last 2 are okay. I don't recall them getting more sexually graphic.
Well, you may as well buy all 4 because you're going to want to read them straight through. Enjoy yourself. I'm envious. :)
I take it you don't believe in pets? Corny likes her cage so much that she came back to it on her own . Interesting.
Oh yeah, corn snakes are great. They don't bite so long as you don't step on them or something. And, they are beautiful & happy.
Fortunately, she realized she didn't really want it before she went to far and showed up back in her cage. How nutty!
One quick resource before I go to bed from @TravisGreenlee - a great way to kick off your 2009: http://mybusinessmasteryblueprint.com/
Hair done. Time to get into bed with Book #2 in the Twilight series. Ah, a guilty pleasure that I don't have to feel guilty about at all!
Kids r in bed waiting for me to read to them and say night so I can go to my hairdresser and get hair done for CNBC appearance 2morro nite!
Just talked w/ lawyer who has engaged 20 new clients this year directly from relationships made on Twitter/Facebook. Free interview soon.
Tweetdeck growing on me. Only trouble I'm having is when I'm already following someone & it says I'm not & won't let me add to a group.
RT @_Brian_Johnson: A-H: â€œShortage of time isn't your problem. Shortage of money isn't your problem.Shortage of Connection to the Energy ...
All my son wants to do is play vid. games - DS, iPhone, xBox, Wii - he doesn't care ; just wants to play. Today, I'm letting him. Bad mom?
Christmas eve morning. The kids got a cool SkyRail for Chanukah last night, so we'll be playing with that today. Going to Agape tonight.
Twilight the movie - FAIL. :( Pls read the book and do not judge by this horrible movie. What a shame.
Ok, I'm going to see Twilight tonight. Dang it, I can't get it out of my head. I'm giving in.
Wish I could stop thinking about the Twilight books. Distracting me from my work! & I've already read all of them, so get out of my head!!
Guess what? Corney, our corn snake came back! I guess her "cage" is a pretty nice place. Warm, roomy, safe ... so happy she's back.
So super sad. Our awesome corn snake got out of her cage, which is outside. Very slim chance of finding her. :(
